caption: Tonight, Ryan Miller is playing in his 491st @NHL game, all as a member of the Buffalo Sabres. Miller ties the Sabres  franchise record for most games played by a goaltender, set by Dominik Hasek. Between the two, they own the franchise record in every major goaltending statistic. #Sabres #MillerTime #Buffalo #Miller #RyanMiller
caption_raw: Tonight, Ryan Miller is playing in his 491st @NHL game, all as a member of the Buffalo Sabres. Miller ties the Sabres’ franchise record for most games played by a goaltender, set by Dominik Hasek. caption:
Leino scores twice but the Sabres fall 4-3 to Washington in a shootout. Go to Sabres.com for the full recap.

Ville Leino scored his first two goals of the season. Leino now has six points (2+4) in eight games since returning from an injury that sidelined him for the first 27 games of the season.
